section.45: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Ali bin Abi Talib:that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "Whoever recites the Qur'an and memorizes it, making lawful what it makes lawful, and unlawful what it makes unlawful, Allah will admit him to Paradise due to it, and grant him intercession for ten of his family members who were to be consigned to the Fire
